name: There is Only 1 Level 2
description:
Game is still in early access, download at your own risk!

You may or may not have beaten Level 1, but can you beat Level 2?

Inspired by jmtb02's This is the Only Level series, There is Only 1 Level 2 is a sequel to This is the Only 3D Level, a 2019 game.

Inside a tropical rainforest, comes a ruin that no one has ever heard of, forgotten by time. Join us on this amazing escape adventure! Can you help us in escaping?

Features

  • Only 1 level!
  • 40 more stages in this level!
  • More puzzles!
  • More beautiful graphics!
  • Cuter characters!
  • Half-vampire protagonist!
  • More variety of music!
  • Have me as a companion!

Do you have what it takes to survive another level?

Note: By default, the game uses Standard shading mode. If you want the game to look like the screenshots, change it to Realistic.
